projects.title: AI Care Website
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web platform for AI-assisted elderly care, featuring real-time image analysis using OpenCV for environment awareness. Implemented a Flask backend with modular APIs and a responsive Bootstrap frontend delivering interactive health-education content.

projects.title: Financial Report Crawler
projects.description: Automated crawler system for downloading financial statements from TWSE, built to streamline analystsâ€™ data-preparation workflow. Utilizes Selenium for dynamic page interaction and BeautifulSoup for structured data extraction, enabling fully automated retrieval and organization of report files.

projects.title: yt_pod
projects.description: Content integration tool that automatically retrieves, transcribes, and summarizes updates from YouTube channels and podcast feeds. Built to unify multi-platform media into a structured dataset, enabling faster review and downstream analysis.

projects.title: Enterprise System Development @ eZoom
projects.description: End-to-end development for large-scale enterprise systems, including frontend modules, backend services, and database architecture. Worked across full-stack layers, implementing .NET 8/C# APIs, FastAPI microservices, Vue frontend interfaces, and schema design for MSSQL/PostgreSQL. Built CI/CD pipelines, automated deployments, and managed production environments on Windows Server + IIS.
